$schema: Drift detection hashes for Automotive Cybersecurity MCP
description: SHA-256 hashes of seed data files used to detect upstream data changes. If a hash changes, the data has been modified and golden tests should be re-validated.
note: Run `npm run check:drift` to verify current hashes match. Regenerate with `npm run update:hashes`.

data/seed/standards.json.description: ISO 21434, TISAX, SAE J3061, AUTOSAR, GB/T standards and clauses
